full_summary:
## Dental Sterilization Audits
### Request for Proposal (RFP)

**Official Solicitation Number:** 21401-28-4206758A

**Title:** Dental Sterilization Audits

**Date of Publication:** 2022-12-01

**Tender Closing Date:** 2022-12-21 at 14:00:00 (Expired)

**Contracting Entity:** Correctional Service of Canada

**Region of Opportunity:** Canada (specifically, Ontario, excluding the National Capital Region)

**Region of Delivery:** Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)

**Duration of Contract:** Period of January 1, 2023 to December 31, 2027 (with an option for two additional one-year periods)

### Operational Context

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) requires an external provider to conduct annual audits of 10 institutions within the Ontario Region to assess compliance with on-site dental sterilization procedures. The Provider will be responsible for evaluating the effectiveness of current practices and identifying areas for improvement.

### Statement of Work

* Conduct annual dental sterilization audits
* Provide a written report within 30 days of each audit, detailing compliance and deficiencies
* Immediately report any identified deficiencies or practices that pose a risk to patient safety, recommending temporary service disruption if necessary

### Pre-Requisites for Participation

* No specific conditions for supplier participation
* Estimated quantity of services to be provided as specified in the Statement of Work and Basis of Payment documents

### Notice and Additional Documents

The Request for Proposal (RFP) and related documentation are available on the Government of Canada's procurement website. Please see the attached documents for further information.
